metadata.description: Shop downloadable sketch bundles, line-art packs, and brush kits for daily drawing practice.

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Curated digital products for artists: practice bundles, line-art collections, and creator brush kits.

items.title: Blue-White Porcelain Pattern Collection (377 PNG + Vector Source)
items.description: A commercial-ready porcelain ornament collection with floral, geometric, and border motifs for packaging, textile, and branding work.
items.long_description: This bundle includes a large hand-curated set of blue-and-white porcelain style motifs. It is built for fast design production: transparent PNG assets for drag-and-drop workflows plus editable vector source files for professional customization in Illustrator, CorelDRAW, and EPS-compatible tools.

image.alt: Blue and white porcelain pattern collection cover

includes: 4 cover preview JPGs for quick browsing
highlights: Suitable for print and digital commercial design
Works for packaging, textiles, branding, invitations, and decor graphics
Transparent PNG workflow for fast composition
items.creator_bio: Sketch Ideas Studio builds practical visual asset packs for designers and illustrators who need fast, editable production resources.
items.delivery: Instant digital download after checkout. Commercial use policy depends on your final store license terms.
